FuncDef: This command specifies the interval between ARP requests sent on this Ipipe SAP. When the SAP is first enabled, an ARP request will be sent to the attached CE device and the received MAC address will be used in addressing unicast traffic to the CE. Although this MAC address will not expire while the Ipipe SAP is enabled and operational, it is verified by sending periodic ARP requests at the specified interval.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the interval, in seconds, between ARP requests sent on this Ipipe SAP. Values-0 to 65535.
